description: This file defines a custom React hook 'usePageView' that logs page view telemetry events whenever the route changes, leveraging React Router's 'useLocation' and React's 'useEffect' hook. It ensures logging occurs only when telemetry is enabled and prevents duplicate logs for the same page.

methods.name: usePageView()
methods.description: A React hook that tracks page views by listening to route changes via 'useLocation'. It logs telemetry events with the current path, document title, and timestamp whenever navigation occurs, respecting telemetry enablement and avoiding duplicate logs on initial mount.
